languages.text: "Может... и вы продадите нам немного своей бесценной капитанской удачи, Ваша Светлость?" {n}Флейтист учтиво кланяется и жестом приглашает к игровому полю. Толпа возбужденно гудит.{/n}

"Perhaps you would like to trade us some of that captain's fortune of yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The flute player bows respectfully and gestures at the game board. The crowd buzzes with anticipation.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Может... и вы продадите нам немного своей бесценной капитанской удачи, Ваша Светлость?" {n}Флейтист учтиво кланяется и жестом приглашает к игровому полю. Толпа возбужденно гудит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps... you would like to trade some of that captain's fortune yourself, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The flute player bows respectfully and gestures at the game board. The crowd buzzes with anticipation.{/n}

"Perhaps you would like to trade us some of that captain's fortune of yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The flute player bows respectfully and gestures at the game board. The crowd buzzes with anticipation.{/n}

languages.text: « Peut-être accepteriez-vous de mettre votre chance de capitaine à l'épreuve, Votre Seigneurie ? »{n}propose le joueur de flûte en désignant le plateau de jeu tout en s'inclinant. Vous entendez un murmure d'excitation parcourir la foule.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would like to trade us some of that captain's fortune of yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The flute player bows respectfully and gestures at the game board. The crowd buzzes with anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être accepteriez-vous de mettre votre chance de capitaine à l'épreuve, Votre Seigneurie ? »{n}propose le joueur de flûte en désignant le plateau de jeu tout en s'inclinant. Vous entendez un murmure d'excitation parcourir la foule.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Tendría a bien intercambiar parte de su fortuna de capitán con nosotros, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». {n}El flautista hace una respetuosa reverencia y señala al tablero con un ademán. Un murmullo de expectación se eleva de la muchedumbre congregada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would like to trade us some of that captain's fortune of yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The flute player bows respectfully and gestures at the game board. The crowd buzzes with anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Tendría a bien intercambiar parte de su fortuna de capitán con nosotros, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». {n}El flautista hace una respetuosa reverencia y señala al tablero con un ademán. Un murmullo de expectación se eleva de la muchedumbre congregada.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなた様の財産の一部を、私たちとトレードしていただけませんか、陛下？」{n}フルート吹きは敬意を表してお辞儀をし、遊戯盤をアピールする。観客は期待でざわめいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would like to trade us some of that captain's fortune of yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The flute player bows respectfully and gestures at the game board. The crowd buzzes with anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなた様の財産の一部を、私たちとトレードしていただけませんか、陛下？」{n}フルート吹きは敬意を表してお辞儀をし、遊戯盤をアピールする。観客は期待でざわめいた。{/n}

languages.text: “或许您也愿意与我们分享一些身为舰长大人的好运，大人？”{n}吹笛人恭恭敬敬地鞠了一躬，朝游戏板做了个手势。周围的人骚动起来，充满了期待。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would like to trade us some of that captain's fortune of yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The flute player bows respectfully and gestures at the game board. The crowd buzzes with anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “或许您也愿意与我们分享一些身为舰长大人的好运，大人？”{n}吹笛人恭恭敬敬地鞠了一躬，朝游戏板做了个手势。周围的人骚动起来，充满了期待。{/n}

languages.text: "Vielleicht möchtet Ihr etwas von Eurem Captain-Wohlstand bei uns loswerden, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?" {n}Der Flötenspieler verbeugt sich respektvoll und deutet auf das Spielbrett. Die Menge brummt vor Vorfreude.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would like to trade us some of that captain's fortune of yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The flute player bows respectfully and gestures at the game board. The crowd buzzes with anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht möchtet Ihr etwas von Eurem Captain-Wohlstand bei uns loswerden, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?" {n}Der Flötenspieler verbeugt sich respektvoll und deutet auf das Spielbrett. Die Menge brummt vor Vorfreude.{/n}

languages.text: "Belki de o kaptanlara layık servetinizin bir kısmını bizimle paylaşmak istersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Flütçü, önünde hürmetle eğilerek oyun tahtasını işaret ediyor. Kalabalık, beklentiyle mırıldanmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would like to trade us some of that captain's fortune of yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The flute player bows respectfully and gestures at the game board. The crowd buzzes with anticipation.{/n}
